index.name: Maria Naggaga
index.bio: Maria Naggaga is a developer and artist. She is a Program Manager on the Visual Studio and .NET team where she explores ways to engage and teach new developers about .NET OSS. Earlier in her career, Maria worked as a Microsoft Technical Evangelist in New York where she worked with a variety of developers on different stacks and technologies. Mariaâ€™s passion is in finding interesting ways on how we can use art, software, and hardware to change perception, tell stories and break stereotypes.
index.title: aria Naggaga | Speakers | MKE DOT NET 2017
